attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alister Darling's compensation package has not gone far enough to help low paid workers without children. In the 10p cut I was going to loose £131 per year the above package should give me £120 per year back.  Does the Labour Party think low paid earners are stupid because we are not. You have increased tax to anyone who earns up to £40K per year, I get the same but only earn £18300 per year with two jobs. You have not helped the low paid workers today.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
